items.name: Scalpel
items.description:
This instrument is used to cut 
 the skin to make open wound.

items.name: What are we going to do?
items.description:
We are going to cut the patient's 
skin with the scalpel.

items.name: Retractor
items.description:
This instrument is used to keep 
the wound open.

items.name: What are we going to do?
items.description:
We are going to put the retractor
 on the open wound so we can
 keep it open.

items.name: Osteotome
items.description:
This instrument is used 
 to break the rib cage.

items.name: What are we going to do?
items.description:
We are going to break throught
 the rib cage with the osteotome.

items.name: Scalpel
items.description:
This instrument is used 
 to cut the arteries and
 the veins.

items.name: What are we going to do?
items.description:
We are going to cut the veins 
and arteries to work on 
replacing the heart.

items.name: Heart
items.description:
This is the new heart to
 replace the sick heart.

items.name: What are we going to do?
items.description:
We are going to put the
 new heart in the right 
place and sew it up.

items.name: Retractor
items.description:
This instrument is used to keep 
the wound open.

items.name: What are we going to do?
items.description:
We are going to pull the 
retractors to close the wound.

items.name: Needle
items.description:
The needle is used 
to sew the open wound.

items.name: What are we going to do?
items.description:
We are going to sew the
 open wound and be good to go.

items.name: Trimmer
items.description:
This instrument is used to cut 
 the patient's hair.

items.name: What are we going to do?
items.description:
We are going to cut his hair so we 
can be able to operate on the patient.

items.name: Scalpel
items.description:
This instrument is used to cut 
the head.

items.name: What are we going to do?
items.description:
We are going to cut the patient's 
head to continue working on the brain.

items.name: Retractor
items.description:
This instrument is used to keep 
the head open.

items.name: What are we going to do?
items.description:
We are going to pull the 
retractors to open the head.

items.name: Drill
items.description:
This instrument is used to 
drill holes in a patient's bones.

items.name: What are we going to do?
items.description:
We are going to drill holes in the 
patient's skull so we can work on it.

items.name: Bone saw
items.description:
This instrument is used to cut 
a patient's bones.

items.name: What are we going to do?
items.description:
We are going to cut the 
patient's skull so we can work on it.

items.name: Suction tube
items.description:
This istrument is used to 
suck blood.

items.name: What are we going to do?
items.description: We are going to suck blood from the wound.

items.name: Metal plate
items.description:
The metal plate is used to 
mend the wound together.

items.name: What are we going to do?
items.description: We are going to place the metal plate on the wound.

items.name: Screw
items.description:
The screw is used to hold the 
metal plate in place.

items.name: What are we going to do?
items.description:
We are going to use the screws to 
hold the metal plate together.
